Jim Webber wrote:
>  
> 
>  > Have a look at JAX-RS from the Java world.
> 
> I'm not certain that today's JAX-RS offers much more than today's WCF in 
> terms of REST support. If Glenn's team are going to do "REST like they 
> meant it" to paraphrase Guilherme, I don't think that JAX-RS is the 
> right way to go.

But that's just an opinion. Or is there some technical criticism as well?

Bill
